channel.title: From that I have to start?
channel.description:
Hi guys,
I am totally n00b in moparscape scripting. I need help what source I've to use to easy understanding. I reed a lot of beginners tutorials. Thanks

item.title: From that I have to start?
item.dc:creator: @Monk_ES Monk ES
item.description:
@Monk_ES wrote:

I suggest learning the basics AWAY from the RSPS scene first i.e. what a boolean is, what an integer is, importing/packages and how Java works (OOP) etc.

Then come back and learn the basics of a server i.e. making yourself an administrator, spawning a item, changing the home location etc.

Read full topic
item.source: From that I have to start?
